CustomField.description: The default owner for the agreement created from a quote/proposal. Valid values are Quote Owner and Current User. If not set, the Quote Owner will become the owner of the new agreement
CustomField.inlineHelpText: The default owner for the agreement created from a quote/proposal. Valid values are Quote Owner and Current User. If not set, the Quote Owner will become the owner of the new agreement
CustomField.label: Default Quote Agreement Owner
